content:
{"settings":"{
  "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
  "editor.accessibilitySupport": "off",
  "workbench.iconTheme": "simple-icons",
  "editor.fontLigatures": true,
  "editor.fontFamily": " 'Fira Code', 'Jetbrains Mono', 'Cascadia Code', Consolas, 'Courier New', monospace",
  "editor.fontSize": 14,
  "editor.fontWeight": "200",
  "cmake.configureOnOpen": true,
  "[python]": {
    "editor.formatOnType": true,
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-python.autopep8"
  },
  "autopep8.args": ["--max-line-length", "120"],
  "editor.renderWhitespace": "none",
  "editor.stickyScroll.enabled": true,
  "editor.guides.highlightActiveIndentation": "always",
  "notebook.lineNumbers": "on",
  "files.associations": {
    "*.py": "python"
  },
  "editor.tokenColorCustomizations": {
    "comments": "#6A737D"
  },
  "editor.semanticTokenColorCustomizations": {
    "enabled": true
  },
  "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
  "git.openRepositoryInParentFolders": "never",
  "editor.lineNumbers": "relative",
  "security.allowedUNCHosts": ["wsl.localhost"],
  "extensions.experimental.affinity": {
    "asvetliakov.vscode-neovim": 1
  },
  "jupyter.askForKernelRestart": false,
  "indentRainbow.indicatorStyle": "light",
  "indentRainbow.lightIndicatorStyleLineWidth": 1,
  "indentRainbow.errorColor": "rgba(128,32,32,0.0)",
  "indentRainbow.colors": [
    "rgba(255,255,64,0.5)",
    "rgba(127,255,127,0.5)",
    "rgba(255,127,255,0.5)",
    "rgba(79,236,236,0.5)"
  ],
  "latex-workshop.latex.recipe.default": "latexmk (xelatex)",
  "latex-workshop.latex.tools": [
    {
      "name": "xelatexmk",
      "command": "latexmk",
      "args": [
        "-synctex=1",
        "-interaction=nonstopmode",
        "-file-line-error",
        "-shell-escape",
        "-xelatex",
        "-outdir=%OUTDIR%",
        "%DOC%"
      ],
      "env": {}
    }
  ],
  "clangd.path": "/home/daniel/.config/Code/User/globalStorage/llvm-vs-code-extensions.vscode-clangd/install/17.0.3/clangd_17.0.3/bin/clangd",
  "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
  "C_Cpp.default.cStandard": "c11",
  "C_Cpp.default.includePath": [
    "C:\\Users\\danie\\AppData\\Local\\Arduino15\\packages\\arduino\\tools\\avr-gcc\\7.3.0-atmel3.6.1-arduino7\\avr\\include",
    "C:\\Program Files\\Raspberry Pi\\Pico SDK v1.5.1\\pico-sdk\\src\\common\\pico_stdlib\\include"
  ],
  "[c]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "xaver.clang-format"
  },
  "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
    "editorLineNumber.foreground": "#6A737D",
    "editorLineNumber.activeForeground": "#ced6df",
    "tab.activeBorder": "#ffae00"
  },
  "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeOpenBrace.block": "sameLine",
  "workbench.settings.applyToAllProfiles": [
    "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeOpenBrace.block",
    "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeOpenBrace.type"
  ],
  "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeOpenBrace.function": "sameLine",
  "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeOpenBrace.lambda": "sameLine",
  "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeOpenBrace.namespace": "sameLine",
  "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeOpenBrace.type": "sameLine",
  "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeElse": false,
  "C_Cpp.vcFormat.newLine.beforeCatch": false,
  "C_Cpp.formatting": "clangFormat",
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "cmake.showConfigureWithDebuggerNotification": false,
  "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
  "cmake.showOptionsMovedNotification": false,
  "editor.tabCompletion": "on",
  "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
  "cmake.pinnedCommands": [
    "workbench.action.tasks.configureTaskRunner",
    "workbench.action.tasks.runTask"
  ],
  "C_Cpp.codeAnalysis.clangTidy.enabled": true,
  "C_Cpp.codeAnalysis.clangTidy.checks.enabled": [
    "google-*",
    "bugprone-*",
    "readability-*",
    "misc-*",
    "clang-analyzer-*",
    "cppcoreguidelines-*",
    "performance-*"
  ],
  "C_Cpp.inlayHints.autoDeclarationTypes.enabled": true,
  "C_Cpp.inlayHints.referenceOperator.enabled": true,
  "C_Cpp.inlayHints.referenceOperator.showSpace": true,
  "C_Cpp.autocompleteAddParentheses": true,
  "explorer.confirmPasteNative": false,
  "hediet.vscode-drawio.resizeImages": null,
  "[cpp]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "xaver.clang-format"
  },
  "C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle": "google",
  "makefile.configureOnOpen": true,
  "workbench.editor.wrapTabs": true,
  "window.density.editorTabHeight": "compact",
  "C_Cpp.clang_format_sortIncludes": false,
  "errorLens.messageBackgroundMode": "none",
  "editor.tabSize": 4,
  "cmake.additionalCompilerSearchDirs": [
    "C:/msys64/mingw32/bin",
    "C:/msys64/mingw64/bin",
    "C:/msys64/clang32/bin",
    "C:/msys64/clang64/bin",
    "C:/msys64/clangarm64/bin",
    "C:/msys64/ucrt64/bin"
  ],
  "git.confirmSync": false,
  "editor.linkedEditing": true,
  "workbench.colorTheme": "Visual Studio Dark - C++",
  "errorLens.enabledDiagnosticLevels": ["error", "info"],
  "vim.handleKeys": {
    "<C-d>": true,
    "<C-s>": false,
    "<C-z>": false,
    "<C-f>": false
  },
  "pylint.args": ["--rcfile=${workspaceFolder}/.pylintrc"],
  "explorer.fileNesting.patterns": {
    "*.ts": "${capture}.js",
    "*.js": "${capture}.js.map, ${capture}.min.js, ${capture}.d.ts",
    "*.jsx": "${capture}.js",
    "*.tsx": "${capture}.ts",
    "tsconfig.json": "tsconfig.*.json",
    "package.json": "package-lock.json, yarn.lock, pnpm-lock.yaml, bun.lockb, bun.lock",
    "Cargo.toml": "Cargo.lock",
    "*.sqlite": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
    "*.db": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
    "*.sqlite3": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
    "*.db3": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
    "*.sdb": "${capture}.${extname}-*",
    "*.s3db": "${capture}.${extname}-*"
  },
  "[cmake]": {
    "editor.quickSuggestions": {
      "strings": true
    }
  },
  "nightwatch.quickSettings.parallels": 12,
  "svelte.enable-ts-plugin": true,
  "vsicons.dontShowNewVersionMessage": true,
  "gitlens.views.scm.grouped.views": {
    "commits": true,
    "branches": true,
    "remotes": true,
    "stashes": false,
    "tags": true,
    "worktrees": true,
    "contributors": true,
    "repositories": false,
    "searchAndCompare": false,
    "launchpad": false
  },
  "remote.SSH.remotePlatform": {
    "rp5.local": "linux",
    "192.168.178.53": "linux"
  },
  "terminal.integrated.profiles.windows": {
    "QMK_MSYS": {
      "path": "C:/QMK_MSYS/usr/bin/bash.exe",
      "env": {
        "MSYSTEM": "MINGW64",
        "CHERE_INVOKING": "1"
      },
      "args": ["--login"]
    }
  },
  "terminal.integrated.cursorStyle": "line",
  "C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine": "disabled",
  "python.analysis.typeCheckingMode": "standard",
  "geminicodeassist.inlineSuggestions.enableAuto": false,
  "git.autofetch": true,
  "cSpell.userWords": [
    "appender",
    "autoleveller",
    "Brushless",
    "canopen",
    "cobid",
    "cornsilk",
    "DGRAM",
    "dimgrey",
    "figsize",
    "filezilla",
    "graphqlrc",
    "ifindex",
    "ifname",
    "mbit",
    "nonblocking",
    "nums",
    "oklch",
    "oneshot",
    "pdos",
    "pico",
    "repr",
    "RPDO",
    "RPDOs",
    "rustc",
    "sdos",
    "Sensorless",
    "serde",
    "serv",
    "setpoint",
    "setpoints",
    "Sfxt",
    "shadcn",
    "skeletonlabs",
    "socketcan",
    "subsec",
    "tcan",
    "tdxsocket",
    "TPDO",
    "TPDOs",
    "turbopack",
    "vcan",
    "ylim",
    "yticks"
  ],
  "gitlens.advanced.messages": {
    "suppressCreatePullRequestPrompt": true
  },
  "[typescript]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
    "editor.formatOnSave": true
  },
  "[svelte]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "svelte.svelte-vscode"
  },
  "typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always",
  "[typescriptreact]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
    "editor.formatOnSave": true
  },
  "[jsonc]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
  },
  "svg.preview.mode": "svg",
  "workbench.editorAssociations": {
    "{hexdiff}:/**/*.*": "hexEditor.hexedit",
    "*.svg": "default"
  }
}
"}
